shared.SMSWorkflow module¶

SMS Workflow

Handles finding the correct customer, generating the template, and sending off the SMS

shared.SMSWorkflow.fetchState(abbr)¶

Fetch State

Returns the full name of the state based on the abbreviation

Parameters

abbr (str) – State abbreviation

Returns

str

shared.SMSWorkflow.fetchTemplate(group, type_, step)¶

Fetch Template

Fetches a template from the local cache or from the DB and returns it

Parameters

  • group (int) – The ID of the group the template is in

  • type (str) – The type of template, ‘async’ vs ‘av’

  • step (int) – The step associated with the template

Returns

str

shared.SMSWorkflow.processTemplate(content, order, misc={})¶

Process Template

Converts variables within the templates into the data provided

Parameters

  • content (str) – The raw template content

  • order (dict) – The order associated

  • misc (dict) – Additional fields that might be set

Returns

str

shared.SMSWorkflow.providerApproves(order_id, user_id, monolith)¶

Provider Approves

Called when the provider who claimed the order approves that order

Parameters

  • order_id (str) – The ID of the order approved

  • user_id (int) – The ID of the user (provider)

  • monolith (services.monolith.Monolith) – An instance of the service used to send SMS messages

Returns

bool

shared.SMSWorkflow.providerApprovesContinuous(order_id, user_id, monolith)¶

Provider Approves Continuous

Called when the provider who claimed the continuous order approves it

Parameters

  • order_id (str) – The ID of the order approved

  • user_id (int) – The ID of the user (provider)

  • monolith (services.monolith.Monolith) – An instance of the service used to send SMS messages

Returns

bool

shared.SMSWorkflow.providerDeclines(order_id, user_id, monolith)¶

Provider Declines

Called when the provider who claimed the order declines that order

Parameters

  • order_id (str) – The ID of the order declined

  • user_id (int) – The ID of the user (provider)

  • monolith (services.monolith.Monolith) – An instance of the service used to send SMS messages

Returns

bool

shared.SMSWorkflow.providerDeclinesContinuous(order_id, user_id, monolith)¶

Provider Declines Continuous

Called when the provider who claimed the continuous order declines it

Parameters

  • order_id (str) – The ID of the order declined

  • user_id (int) – The ID of the user (provider)

  • monolith (services.monolith.Monolith) – An instance of the service used to send SMS messages

Returns

bool

shared.SMSWorkflow.providerMessaged(order_id, note_id)¶

Provider Messages

Called when the provider sends a message to the patient, usually for further information

Parameters

  • order_id (str) – The order associated with the message

  • note_id (int) – The ID of the note created by the message

Returns

bool

shared.SMSWorkflow.providerOpens(order_id, user_id, monolith)¶

Provider Opens

Called when the provider opens the order record

Parameters

  • order_id (str) – The ID of the order

  • user_id (int) – The ID of the user (provider)

  • monolith (services.monolith.Monolith) – An instance of the service used to send SMS messages

Returns

bool

shared.SMSWorkflow.shipping(info)¶

Shipping

Handles sending out a shipped order SMS

Parameters

info (dict) – Tracking info to handle

Returns

None
